lines.text: What's with her?
Aah, she just wants a bunch of kids.
Kids? Aw, they're mean when they get on that kick.
She's like a cockroach what turned into a butterfly!
Does it still kinda get you right here?
Nothing would give me greater pleasure than to be proven an imbecile.
Nobody arrives first, sir. They all arrive last.
I ain't gonna marry her! An' y'know why? 'Cause my wife don't like it when I go around marryin' people! She's funny that way!

[rounding up Darcey's goons]
Alright we'll tie them up and lock them in the bathroom and when he gets his apple, we'll be back to pick ya up!

[pushing the goons]
Move!
Oh Wait a minute, lock them in the closet, Joy Boy. The maid just waxed the bathroom floor!
Hey Joy Boy, how is your Spanish?
As good as my French and they both stink!
Hey Junior, did you learn anything from Spanish Lena?
Spanish Lena was a Hungarian...
Where am I gonna find her a husband, huh? In Macy's basement?
They don't sell them there, boss.

[Queenie walks with her make-up artists]
Alright, gang, here is your challenge. Com'on Annie, stand up and meet your makers.
[Annie stands up]
Now this got to be a complete overhaul, kids, from top to bottom.
Don't forget a new set of kidneys...
Com'on Annie, lets go.
[leading Annie to the bedroom]
Com'on wizards, let's wiz!

[Junior shaking his head]
My old lady always say you cannot make a pig's ear out of an old sow.
Monsieur, your old lady was not Pierre! Hum!

[seeing the Butler packed and sneaking out of his room]
Now where do you think you're goin?
Well I... I'm fleeting from Armageddon, sir. With my cardiac condition, I... I just cannot take unhappy endings. So I'm off to join Mr. Kent in Havana, sir.
With two broken legs?
My legs, sir, oh they're quite... Oh. OHHH! Very cleverly put, sir, yes... thank you, sir... Not at all...
[hurries back into his room]

[handing butler a large sum of money]
Ok Hutch, this oughtta take care of the helps for a while, you split it up amongst them...
Oh... heh heh
They know enough to keep their mouth shut?...
And their ears, yes sir...
You told them what happens if they didn't...
Oh yes
[forming a gun with his fingers imitating the sound of a machine gun]
da da da da da da da da...

[putting a hand out to stop the 'gun']
Don't... don't do that...
